title: Next skin discounts ?
body: When is the next event for some skin discounts ? I want some in the legendary section

replies.body:
Hiya! 

All the sales for June have been listed [here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/june-sales-schedule). While it doesn't state the exact dates, you can take a look at what to expect for this month.
Btw, Legendary skins never get put on sale.

currently these are the skins on sale
